text: Frenkie de Jong (; born 12 May 1997) is a Dutch professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for La Liga club Barcelona and the Netherlands national team. He previously played for Ajax. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Willem II 2014–15 Eredivisie 1 0 0 0 — — 1 0 2015–16 Eredivisie 1 0 1 0 — — 2 0 Total 2 0 1 0 — — 3 0 Jong Ajax 2015–16 Eerste Divisie 15 2 — — — 15 2 2016–17 Eerste Divisie 31 6 — — — 31 6 Total 46 8 — — — 46 8 Ajax 2016–17 Eredivisie 4 1 3 0 4 0 — 11 1 2017–18 Eredivisie 22 0 2 1 2 0 — 26 1 2018–19 Eredivisie 31 3 4 0 17 0 — 52 3 Total 57 4 9 1 23 0 — 89 5 Barcelona 2019–20 La Liga 29 2 3 0 9 0 1 0 42 2 2020–21 La Liga 37 3 5 3 7 0 2 1 51 7 2021–22 La Liga 32 3 2 0 12 1 1 0 47 4 2022–23 La Liga 33 2 2 0 6 0 2 0 43 2 2023–24 La Liga 7 1 0 0 1 0 0 0 8 1 Total 138 11 12 3 35 1 6 1 191 16 Career total 243 23 22 4 58 1 6 1 329 29 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Netherlands 2018 5 0 2019 10 1 2020 7 0 2021 16 0 2022 12 1 2023 4 0 Total 54 2 :Scores and results list Netherlands' goal tally first, score column indicates score after each De Jong goal.
